-- | Haskeline backend module for Shellac
--   
--   This module provides a backend for Shellac using the Haskeline
--   library. It provides rich line editing capabilities, command
--   completion and command history features.
@package Shellac-haskeline
@version 0.2.0.2

module System.Console.Shell.Backend.Haskeline
haskelineBackend :: ShellBackend ShellacState
data ShellacState
